articles.title: No Chickenjoy: Jollibee closes Philippines outlet after woman finds fried towel in meal - AsiaOne
articles.description: Many Filipinos enjoy Jollibee's fried chicken but one woman found no joy in her meal. On Wednesday (June 2), Alique Perez took to Facebook to express her disgust when the Chickenjoy meal she had ordered via a food delivery app turned out to be something else.…

articles.title: Accenture marks Southeast Asia foray with acquisition of KL-based Entropia - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (June 3): Consulting and processing services provider Accenture has acquired Kuala Lumpur-based Entropia, marking its very first acquisition in Southeast Asia.In a statement today, Irish-domiciled and New York Stock Exhange-listed Accenture said …

articles.title: Shopee vows to continue boosting domestic retail - Manila Bulletin
articles.description:
Shopee, the  leading online marketplace in Southeast Asia, has vowed to continue boosting the retail industry, including the Philippines, with no let up in promotional sales and campaigns throughout the year.
